result.html: An bhfuair tú bearradh gruaigeDid you get a haircut?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuair tú bearraḋ gruaigeDid you get a haircut?

result.html: An bhfuair tú mo theachtaireachtDid you get my message?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuair tú mo ṫeaċtaireaċtDid you get my message?

result.eng: I was lucky that I got the job.
result.ga: Bhí an t-ádh orm go bhfuair mé an post
result.orig: Bhí an t-ádh orm go bhfuair mé an post
result.html: Bhí an t-ádh orm go bhfuair mé an postI was lucky that I got the job.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an t-áḋ orm go ḃfuair mé an postI was lucky that I got the job.

result.eng: She kept on complaining until she got an answer.
result.ga: Lean sí ag gearán léi go bhfuair sí freagra
result.orig: Lean sí ag gearán léi go bhfuair sí freagra
result.html: Lean sí ag gearán léi go bhfuair sí freagraShe kept on complaining until she got an answer.
result.ponchtml: Lean sí ag gearán léi go ḃfuair sí freagraShe kept on complaining until she got an answer.

result.ga: Ní bhfuair mé ach ceann amháin
result.orig: Ní bhfuair mé ach ceann amháin
result.html: Ní bhfuair mé ach ceann amháinI only got one.
result.ponchtml: Ní ḃfuair mé aċ ceann aṁáinI only got one.

result.eng: I didn't get recognition for my work.
result.ga: Ní bhfuair mé aitheantas as mo chuid oibre
result.orig: Ní bhfuair mé aitheantas as mo chuid oibre
result.html: Ní bhfuair mé aitheantas as mo chuid oibreI didn't get recognition for my work.
result.ponchtml: Ní ḃfuair mé aiṫeantas as mo ċuid oibreI didn't get recognition for my work.

result.ga: Ní bhfuair mé bricfeasta go fóill
result.orig: Ní bhfuair mé bricfeasta go fóill
result.html: Ní bhfuair mé bricfeasta go fóillI haven't had breakfast yet.
result.ponchtml: Ní ḃfuair mé bricfeasta go fóillI haven't had breakfast yet.

result.html: Ní bhfuair mé faicI didn't get anything.
result.ponchtml: Ní ḃfuair mé faicI didn't get anything.

result.eng: I haven't gotten an answer to my question yet.
result.ga: Ní bhfuair mé freagra ar mo cheist go fóill
result.orig: Ní bhfuair mé freagra ar mo cheist go fóill
result.html: Ní bhfuair mé freagra ar mo cheist go fóillI haven't gotten an answer to my question yet.
result.ponchtml: Ní ḃfuair mé freagra ar mo ċeist go fóillI haven't gotten an answer to my question yet.

result.eng: She got no money from me.
result.ga: Ní bhfuair sí aon airgead uaim
result.orig: Ní bhfuair sí aon airgead uaim
result.html: Ní bhfuair sí aon airgead uaimShe got no money from me.
result.ponchtml: Ní ḃfuair sí aon airgead uaimShe got no money from me.

result.eng: I didn't receive the e-mail, even though I have registered.
result.ga: Ní bhfuair mé an ríomhphost tar éis gur chláraigh mé
result.orig: Ní bhfuair mé an ríomhphost tar éis gur chláraigh mé
result.html: Ní bhfuair mé an ríomhphost tar éis gur chláraigh méI didn't receive the e-mail, even though I have registered.
result.ponchtml: Ní ḃfuair mé an ríoṁṗost tar éis gur ċláraiġ méI didn't receive the e-mail, even though I have registered.

result.eng: Did you not get the invitation?
result.html: Nach bhfuair tú an cuireadhDid you not get the invitation?
result.ponchtml: Naċ ḃfuair tú an cuireaḋDid you not get the invitation?

result.eng: Everybody who ever died in this house.
result.ga: Iomlán a bhfuair bás sa teach seo riamh
result.orig: Iomlán a bhfuair bás sa teach seo riamh
result.html: Iomlán a bhfuair bás sa teach seo riamhEverybody who ever died in this house.
result.ponchtml: Iomlán a ḃfuair bás sa teaċ seo riaṁEverybody who ever died in this house.

result.eng: It's a shame I didn't get an education when I was young.
result.ga: Ba mhór an truaighe nach bhfuair mé foghlaim i m'óige
result.orig: Ba mhór an truaighe nach bhfuair mé foghlaim i m'óige
result.html: Ba mhór an truaighe nach bhfuair mé foghlaim i m'óigeIt's a shame I didn't get an education when I was young.
result.ponchtml: Ba ṁór an truaiġe naċ ḃfuair mé foġlaim i m'óigeIt's a shame I didn't get an education when I was young.

result.eng: They haven't had anything to eat since I don't know when.
result.ga: Ní bhfuair siad aon ghreim le níl a fhios agam cá huair
result.orig: Ní bhfuair siad aon ghreim le níl a fhios agam cá huair
result.html: Ní bhfuair siad aon ghreim le níl a fhios agam cá huairThey haven't had anything to eat since I don't know when.
result.ponchtml: Ní ḃfuair siad aon ġreim le níl a ḟios agam cá huairThey haven't had anything to eat since I don't know when.
